name: Christmas Present RUSH
description:
You might have gotten your presents this Christmas, but Santa is LATE with everyone else's! What's worse, apart from Rudolph, all the other reindeer are asleep! Help Santa and Rudolph catch up on as many deliveries as they can, but watch out for some bats who want to get in Santa's way!

Use the W, A, S and D keys or the arrow keys to move, and press the Space bar to drop a present. Be careful when flying, and drop presents into the houses, and if a bat flies into a present, it gets destroyed!

Good luck! Can you help Santa redeem himself?
